t: Amazon.com: My First Craftsman Toy Chainsaw and Goggles : Toys & Games
s: My 2 year old loves it. Realistic, portable, and not loud. Only problem I've had is it only works with "cheap" batteries. When the starter batteries went out, it wouldn't take name brand batteries. Goggles and "tool" it comes with are kind of unnecessary, except to show the value of eye protection.
